attrs.name: active
attrs.desc: Set the selected step of the step bar. The default value is -1.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value for this property is - 1

attrs.name: count-field
attrs.desc: Set the field name corresponding to the logo count in the advanced wizard. The default value is'count'
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is count.

attrs.name: name-field
attrs.desc: Set the field name corresponding to the name in the node information. The default value is'name'
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is name.

attrs.name: space
attrs.desc: Set the width of the step bar.

attrs.name: status-field
attrs.desc: Name of the field corresponding to the data status. The default value is'status'
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is status.

events.name: click
events.desc: Node click event. Parameter: (index: node index, node: node data information)
